entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:09 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 9:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %

Dewpoint: -7.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
